name: Tiny Bomber
description:
A roguelite STG with limited time

This game is in development. It will be a roguelike game soon then the tiny bomber named "osprey" can be updated and modified! 

Controller: Left Stick - Move & A - Dodge

Keyboard: WASD - Move & Space - Dodge

You need to dodge right over the bullet to speed up the map scroller while collecting coins to delay the countdown!

If you are interested in this game, please join the channel: https://discord.gg/4WrKN2j2cn
